instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2936 water damage , slow ,error -SMC IO failed
threads.message:
this is water damaged and works slow. After run ASD efi shows me SMC io failed. so what should i check further.
Thanks.

threads.title: 820-2936 water damage , slow ,error -SMC IO failed
threads.message:
Which ASD test shows that error?
Each test is resumed in 3-4 message lines.

BTW, set On Error mode to Continue before start ASD test.

threads.title: 820-2936 water damage , slow ,error -SMC IO failed
threads.message: This is ASD EFI3S144. The error is as following attached:

threads.title: 820-2936 water damage , slow ,error -SMC IO failed
threads.message: I changed U5510 and found p1 :  3.1V and still its cursor is moving slow. So is it right 3.1 V?

threads.title: 820-2936 water damage , slow ,error -SMC IO failed
threads.message:
You still have corroded traces, or resistors.
Check U5510/20 area and continuity to their sensors.

threads.title: 820-2936 water damage , slow ,error -SMC IO failed
threads.message: Checked U5510/20  area  and continuity  , all are good . any other idea.Thanks.
